channel.title: ~Server Offer~
channel.description:
Hello, Im Tnc Ninja, I Been Trying To Make Myself A Server Lately, And I Got A Offer For You
If Someone Can Guide Me Through How To Make A Server From Scratch, I looked Up So Many Guides, Videos, And I Understand Nothing, I Downloaded The Source Homiescape. I Like Everything About it, Just The Kind I Was Looking For, I Use Windows 7, So This Is The Offer:
If Someone Can Guide Me Through It, Useing Homiescape, And Teach Me How To Code. If Someone Can Help Me With Those, Please PM Me, Or Msg Me On MSN Or Skype. But If You Help Me And I Get Those, I Will Pay You, Send Money, Or Use PayPal And Pay You Over $100!
MSN-Tyler_chief@hotmail.com Skype-tyler9163
Please Can Anyone Help me

item.title: ~Server Offer~
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“TncNinja, post:10, topic:335692”]:o i posted here omg! look im in a bad mood and im about to flip out on someone -.-[/quote]It’s inevitable that you’re going to get a warning for the thread alone, unless of course you delete the original post. Don’t continue controversy to make it a mute/moderation.

[quote=“TncNinja, post:12, topic:335692”]make me kid, this is a forums you cant tell me what to do, idc if you own a server i bet it fails badly, idc if you coded before, i just dont give a fuck[/quote]Moderators can easily direct you away from this site.

Read full topic

item.title: ~Server Offer~
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“TncNinja, post:8, topic:335692”]idc about rules -.- only little 5 year olds cry aabout rules ex: Nooo its agsinst the rules!@!
idc i need to get a server -.- and, the reason its over $100, cause all my staff is putting in $20+ and stfu rip4d you dont know nothing, no guides can help or nothing where im stuck st stfu[/quote]I’ve coded before, so I know more than you.
I have a server of my own, I know more than you.
Guides do help you, you’re just not smart enough nor patient enough to actually use them.

Now do us all a favor, and shut your 10 year old, grammatically incorrect mouth.
